Bash(__NEW_LINE_0f0b29054116ddc3__ python3 <<'EOF'
import json
with open\('/tmp/nasdaq_etf.json'\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)

rows = data.get\('data', {}\).get\('data', {}\).get\('rows', []\)
print\(f'ETF总数: {len\(rows\)}'\)

# 搜索TLT
for r in rows:
    if r.get\('symbol'\) == 'TLT':
        print\(f'\\n找到TLT: {r.get\("symbol"\)} - {r.get\("companyName"\)}'\)
        break
else:
    print\('\\n未找到TLT'\)
    
# 搜索Treasury相关
treasury = [r for r in rows if 'Treasury' in r.get\('companyName', ''\)]
print\(f'Treasury相关ETF: {len\(treasury\)}只'\)
for t in treasury[:10]:
    print\(f'  {t.get\("symbol"\)}: {t.get\("companyName"\)}'\)
EOF)
